item.title: Building Neovim
item.description: CMake revisited Since Neovim uses CMake as its build system, I made quick review of its usage after reading following interesting references. CMake Reference: CPack DEB Generator Making a deb package with CMake/CPack and hosting it in a private APT repository Effective Modern CMake Everything You Never Wanted to Know About CMake CMake basics The good old way to configure a source package with CMake is as follows: $ cd path/to/source $ mkdir build $ cd build $ cmake [<options>] .
